price: Àti pé mo fi Allāhu búra, dájúdájú mo máa dète sí àwọn òrìṣà yín lẹ́yìn tí ẹ bá pẹ̀yìn dà, tí ẹ lọ.”
arabic: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصۡنَٰمَكُم بَعۡدَ أَن تُوَلُّواْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
